name: Project: Nitro
description:
!!WARNING!! !READ THIS FIRST!

The game will be played from April 18, 2021 - so far you can enter the game and play training. Thank you for understanding.
Everyone who bought Project: Nitro in Early Access or now (before the beta launch) is entitled to PREMIUM - DLC for free. After running the Beta version, this DLC will be charged (€ 7.99).

OVERVIEW
Are you bored and want to have fun for a while? so then you go play Project: Nitro. In the game you can play alone but you will have a choice to play COOP mode but you can also play online PVP, there is currently one map and one mod in the game, but new updates are released every week.

VEHICLES & ABILITIES
There is one type of tank and one transporter in the game, all these vehicles have different weapons equipment, for example the tank has a machine gun and the player can choose different types of missiles, the transporter has different weapons equipment and the equipment is different.

New weapons and improvements for vehicles will be added to the updates, the game is in beta and we will be happy for any feedback.

MULTIPLAYER
Multiplayer will be accessible from 24.4 and can play up to 20 players on one server.
